1COR 15.10 aþþan anstai gudis im saei im, jasso ansts is in mis halka ni warþ, ak managizo im allaim usaiwida, aþþan ni ik, ak ansts gudis miþ mis.
1COR 15.11 iþ jaþþe ik jaþþe jainai, swa merjam, jah swa galaubideduþ.
1COR 15.12 þande nu Xristus merjada þatei urrais us dauþaim, ƕaiwa qiþand sumai in izwis þatei usstass dauþaim nist?
1COR 15.13 iþ jabai usstass dauþaim nist, nih Xristus urrais.
1COR 15.14 aþþan jabai Xristus ni urrais, sware þau jasso mereins unsara, jah so galaubeins unsara lausa.
1COR 15.15 bi-gitanda-þ-þan galiugaweitwods gudis, unte weitwodidedum bi guþ þatei urraisida Xristu, þanei ni urraisida.
1COR 15.16 jah jabai auk dauþans ni urreisand, nih Xristus urrais.
1COR 15.17 iþ jabai Xristus ni urrais, sware jah so galaubeins izwara ist;
1COR 15.18 þanuh jaþþai gaslepandans in Xristau fraqistnodedun.
1COR 15.19 jabai in þizai libainai in Xristau wenjandans sijum þatainei, armostai sium allaize manne.
1COR 15.20 iþ nu Xristus urrais us dauþaim, anastodeins gaslepandane waurþans;
1COR 15.21 unte auk þairh mannan dauþus, jah þairh mannan usstass dauþaize;
1COR 15.22 unte swaswe in Adama allai gadauþnand, swah in Xristau allai gaqiunand.
1COR 15.23 aþþan ƕarjizuh in seinai tewai:
þaþroþþan þai Xristaus in quma is.
1COR 15.24 þaþroþþan andeis, þan anafilhiþ þiudinassu guda jah attin, þan gatairiþ all reikjis jah waldufnjis jah mahtais.
1COR 15.25 skal auk is þiudanon und þatei galagjiþ allans fijands is uf fotuns imma.
1COR 15.26 alluh auk ufhnaiwida uf fotuns imma;
1COR 15.27 iþ biþe qiþiþ: alla ufhnaiwida sind, bairht þatei inu þana izei ufhnaiwida uf ina þo alla.
1COR 15.28 þanuh biþe alla gakunnun sik faura imma, þanuþþan is silba sunus gakann sik faura þamma ufhnaiwjandin uf ina þo alla, ei sijai guþ alla in allaim.
1COR 15.29 aiþþau ƕa waurkjand þai daupjandans faur dauþans, jabai allis dauþans ni urreisand?
1COR 15.30 duƕe þau weis bireikjai sijum ƕeilo ƕoh?
1COR 15.31 daga ƕammeh gaswiltandans in izwaraizos ƕoftuljos, broþrjus, þoei haba in Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma.
1COR 15.32 jabai bi mannam du diuzam waih in Aifaison, ƕo mis boto jabai dauþans ni urreisand?
matjam jah drigkam, unte du maurgina gaswiltam.
1COR 15.34 usskarjiþ izwis garaihtaba janni frawaurkjaid;
1COR 15.47 sa fruma manna us airþai muldeins,
sa anþar manna, frauja, us himina.
1COR 15.48 ƕileiks sa muldeina, swaleikai jah þai muldeinans;
ƕileiks sa ufarhiminakunda, swaleikai jah þai ufarhiminakundans.
1COR 15.49 jah swaswe berum mannleikan þis airþeinins, bairaima jah frisaht þis himinakundins.
1COR 15.50 þata auk qiþa, broþrjus, þei leik jah bloþ þiudinassu gudis ganiman ni magun, nih riurei unriureins arbjo wairþiþ.
allai auk ni gaswiltam, iþ allai inmaidjanda.
1COR 15.52 suns, in braƕa augins, in spedistin þuthaurna;
þuthaurneiþ auk, jah dauþans usstandand unriurjai, jah weis inmaidjanda.
1COR 15.53 skuld auk ist þata riurjo gahamon unriurein, jah þata diwano gahamon undiwanein.
1COR 15.54 þanuþþan þata diwano gawasjada undiwanein, þanuh wairþiþ waurd þata gamelido:
